text: i love you radin mas i miss you so much i wish i could go back great teachers i love you mrs ten and mr lee and mdm tan i love you i recommend great place great friends great buddy system if they still do that (for the p4s to show the newcoming p1s around during recess) i miss mr farizal great principal very fun activities and fantastic canteen food the school is well built and the 011 batch is great sad we graduated liao but nice school come here for very fun childhood okay
Very good school and W teachers. I used to be in this primary school and there are many fun activities to do and plenty of cca choices. 10/10 recommend younger audience to go to this school!!

My school.
Canteen food is sooo good!
Stall 1: snacks & dim sum (cafe shangri-ba)
Stall 2: drinks & fruits (cool station)
Stall 3: noodles (taste of asia)
Stall 4: japanese food (sunshine cuisine)
Stall 5: nasi lemak & hot dogs (gul sedap)
Stall 6: economic rice (kurin delight)
Stall 7: bee hoon & fish balls (melody place)
Stall 8: malay food (halal zone)
My niece goes to school here and so have I,it is a family tradition,I highly recommend this school if you are looking for a perfect school for your kids.
this is just personal opinion but this is a great primary school the teachers and the teaching style here is great too
